--- title: 11 publications using GAP in the category "General algebraic systems" layout: default ---

[A02] Aichinger, E., The polynomial functions on certain semidirect products of groups, Acta Sci. Math. (Szeged), 68 (1-2) (2002), 63–81.

[BFS16] Bailey, A., Finn-Sell, M., and Snocken, R., Subsemigroup, ideal and congruence growth of free semigroups, Israel J. Math., 215 (1) (2016), 459–501.

[BS02] Bergman, C. and Slutzki, G., Computational complexity of generators and nongenerators in algebra, Internat. J. Algebra Comput., 12 (5) (2002), 719–735.

[D13] DeMeo, W., Expansions of finite algebras and their congruence lattices, Algebra Universalis, 69 (3) (2013), 257–278.

[MS18] Maxson, C. J. and Saxinger, F., Rings of congruence preserving functions, Monatsh. Math., 187 (3) (2018), 531–542.

[M06] Mayr, P., The polynomial functions on Frobenius complements, Acta Sci. Math. (Szeged), 72 (1-2) (2006), 37–50.

[MD20] Merlini Giuliani, M. D. L. and Dos Anjos, G. S., Lie automorphic loops under half-automorphisms, J. Algebra Appl., 19 (11) (2020), 2050221, 19.

[NPZ20] Niebrzydowski, M., Pilitowska, A., and Zamojska-Dzienio, A., Knot-theoretic flocks, J. Knot Theory Ramifications, 29 (5) (2020), 2050026, 16.

[PV05] Phillips, J. D. and Vojtěchovský, P., Linear groupoids and the associated wreath products, J. Symbolic Comput., 40 (3) (2005), 1106–1125.

[SV14] Stanovský, D. and Vojtěchovský, P., Abelian extensions and solvable loops, Results Math., 66 (3-4) (2014), 367–384.

[SV14] Stanovský, D. and Vojtěchovský, P., Commutator theory for loops, J. Algebra, 399 (2014), 290–322.
